weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.core

Class GMLVQDefaultObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.core.GMLVQDefaultObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class GMLVQDefaultObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    Provides a light-weight, neutral, non-Weka implementation of the Observer interface, so a Visualizer can be available even when GMLVQCore was invoked from Tests or operated upon by directly using its API.
    Author:
    S
